content: break yarn and sew in row 16 slip wyib k4 *yo sk2p yo k5 * yo ends k2tog k2 garter stitch trim chart key cast on 139 stitches total with #7 needle work 10 knit row creating 5 garter ridges additional note wyif with yarn in front only on wrong side row next row ws k5 place marker work elven lace pattern beginning on r1 to last five stitches pm k5 r2 rs k5 slip marker work pattern to last 5 stitches slip marker k5 continue in this manner knitting the first and last 5 stitches always in garter after finishing row 16 for last repeat purl 1 row knit 10 row 5 garter ridges bind of loosely steam press lightly ws facing up and give to your little pixie to enjoy for snuggly time elven chart tall gal can be found at www tallgalknits typepead com or on ravelry elven written instructions under tallgalknits row 1 and all wrong side row slip wyif with yarn in front p across if you find any errors in the pattern please feel row 2 slip wyib k1 *yo ssk k6 * end last free to contact me at tallgalknits@gmail com repeat with k5 row 4 slip wyib k2 *yo ssk k3 k2tog yo k1* yo ssk k4 row 6 slip wyib k3 *yo ssk k1 k2tog yo this material may not be reprinted without k3 * yo ssk k3 the permission of the author this pattern row 8 slip wyib k1 k2tog *yo k5 yo may not be used to produce items for sk2p * yo k5 commercial purposes please do not make row 10 slip wyib k5 *yo ssk k6* yo ssk illegal copies of this pattern k1 row 12 slip wyib k3 k2tog *yo k1 yo ssk designed by tallgalknits @2010 k3 k2tog * yo k3 row 14 slip wyib k2 *k2tog yo k3 yo ssk v 2 2 10/10/11 k1 * k2tog yo k4
